kung_pao_chicken.title: Kung Pao Chicken
kung_pao_chicken.Description: A classic Sichuan dish featuring tender chicken, peanuts, and vegetables in a spicy and savory sauce.

steps.step1: Dice chicken and marinate in soy sauce.
steps.step2: Stir-fry chicken with peanuts, bell peppers, and dried red chilies.
steps.step3: Add a sauce made of soy sauce, vinegar, and Sichuan peppercorns.
steps.step4: Cook until chicken is cooked through and the sauce thickens. Serve hot.

dim_sum.title: Dim Sum
dim_sum.Description: A variety of bite-sized Chinese dishes, including dumplings, buns, and rolls, often served with tea.

steps.step2: Fry spring rolls and shrimp balls until golden brown.
steps.step3: Serve with siu mai and a pot of tea.

mapo_tofu.title: Mapo Tofu
mapo_tofu.Description: A spicy Sichuan dish made with tofu and minced meat in a flavorful sauce.

steps.step2: Cook ground meat with Sichuan bean paste and soy sauce.
steps.step3: Add tofu and simmer until heated through.
steps.step4: Garnish with Sichuan peppercorns and green onions. Serve with rice.

sweet_and_sour_chicken.title: Sweet and Sour Chicken
sweet_and_sour_chicken.Description: Crispy chicken pieces coated in a tangy sweet and sour sauce with bell peppers and pineapple.

steps.step1: Coat chicken pieces in cornstarch and deep-fry until crispy.
steps.step2: Stir-fry bell peppers and pineapple chunks.
steps.step3: Make a sweet and sour sauce with vinegar, ketchup, and sugar.
steps.step4: Combine everything and simmer until the sauce thickens. Serve hot.

fried_rice.title: Fried Rice
fried_rice.Description: Cooked rice stir-fried with vegetables, eggs, and a choice of meat or tofu, seasoned with soy sauce.

steps.step3: Add cooked rice and soy sauce.
steps.step4: Mix in scrambled eggs and stir-fry until heated through.

peking_duck.title: Peking Duck
peking_duck.Description: A famous Beijing dish featuring crispy duck skin, served with thin pancakes, hoisin sauce, and sliced scallions.

steps.step1: Roast duck until skin is crispy.
steps.step2: Serve with thin pancakes, hoisin sauce, and sliced scallions.
steps.step3: Wrap the duck and condiments in the pancakes and enjoy.

hot_and_sour_soup.title: Hot and Sour Soup
hot_and_sour_soup.Description: A spicy and tangy Chinese soup made with tofu, mushrooms, and a flavorful broth.

steps.step1: Simmer tofu and mushrooms in a flavorful broth.
steps.step2: Add beaten eggs and stir to create ribbons.
steps.step3: Season with vinegar, soy sauce, and chili sauce. Serve hot.

mongolian_beef.title: Mongolian Beef
mongolian_beef.Description: Sliced beef stir-fried with scallions and a sweet and savory sauce, served over steamed rice.

steps.step1: Slice beef thinly and marinate in soy sauce and brown sugar.
steps.step2: Stir-fry beef with scallions, garlic, and ginger.
steps.step3: Serve over steamed rice. Garnish with sesame seeds.

spring_rolls.title: Spring Rolls
spring_rolls.Description: Crispy rolls filled with a mixture of vegetables, meat, or shrimp, often served with a dipping sauce.

steps.step1: Prepare the filling by stir-frying vegetables and meat or shrimp.
steps.step2: Wrap the filling in spring roll wrappers and deep-fry until golden brown.
steps.step3: Serve with a dipping sauce of your choice.

general_tsos_chicken.title: General Tso's Chicken
general_tsos_chicken.Description: Crispy chicken pieces coated in a sweet and spicy sauce with broccoli florets.

steps.step1: Coat chicken pieces in cornstarch and deep-fry until crispy.
steps.step2: Stir-fry broccoli florets and make a sweet and spicy sauce with soy sauce, sugar, vinegar, and chili paste.
steps.step3: Combine everything and cook until the sauce thickens. Serve hot.
